reply.question: Can the user opt out of data collection or delete data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, users can opt out of data collection by requesting data deletion via email. However, users cannot delete their account/data if they have an active subscription, as the processing of their data is necessary for the execution of the contract.
answer.simple_answer: Yes, users can request data deletion.

extended_simple_answer.comment: Users have the right to delete their personal data, but there are restrictions if they have an active subscription.
